DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : LONDON ; BACK TO THE GULF
DOC.TEXT: Prime_Minister John Major will visit Saudi_Arabia and the United Arab Emirates on Sunday and Monday en route to his first visit to South_Africa under the new democratic regime . He will meet Saudi King Fahd and , according to officials at No . 10 Downing St. , discuss Persian_Gulf security , the war in Yemen , the Middle_East peace settlement and other issues . Privately , Major is expected to continue to push leaders in Saudi_Arabia and the Emirates to consider British products in their government purchases , reminding them of the role Britain played in the Gulf War .
